Data from Hydros 21 or Decagon CDT-10 sensor

Ensure your device works with this simple test.

examples/bhydros_ex.py
 1from devices.hydros import Hydros
 2
 3#//=========================================
 4def get_data():
 5    """Main driver to fetch most recent data and return in the form of a bytearray for transmitting over LoRA
 6
 7    Returns:
 8        bytearray: bytearray containing encoded data from the logger (intended for LoRa usage)
 9    """
10    sensor_data = Hydros().get_data()
11    
12    return sensor_data
13#//=========================================
